toppiprc wrote:

>   There is always some exception, here or there?  Who can tell me the
> detail configuration and steps!

First, the official story: 
http://crawler.archive.org/requirements.html#hardware (Scrowl down to 
the 'Linux' section).

Known issues running Heritrix on windows are:

+ We don't have a batch script to start Heritrix so often the classpath 
is incorrectly set.  See http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#windowsstart.
+ See also http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#windowsmkdir

Good luck,
St.Ack
